FuncDef:
The enable command enables a NetStream aggregation mode.
The undo enable command disables a NetStream aggregation mode.
By default, no NetStream aggregation mode is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Original flow statistics are used to analyze sampled packets. Various types of original flows sharing characteristics can be aggregated into an aggregated flow. An aggregated flow has less data volume and shared characteristics, which meets requirements of feature-based statistics collection.
After creating an IPv4 or IPv6 NetStream aggregation mode using the ip netstream aggregation or ipv6 netstream aggregation command in the system view, you must run the enable command in the aggregation view to make the aggregation mode take effect.
